dublinCore.dc:title: 111 HR 3564 IH: New Mexico Native American Water Settlements Technical Corrections Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Ben Ray Luján of New Mexico introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To make technical corrections to certain Native American water rights settlements in the State of New Mexico, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the New Mexico Native American Water Settlements Technical Corrections Act.

subsection.text: Section 505(f)(1) of the Taos Pueblo Indian Water Rights Settlement Act (Public Law 111–291; 124 Stat. 3125) is amended by inserting , including reconstruction, replacement, rehabilitation, or repair, after construction.

subsection.header: Authorizations, ratifications, confirmations, and conditions precedent
subsection.text: Section 509(c) of the Taos Pueblo Indian Water Rights Settlement Act (Public Law 111–291; 124 Stat. 3128) is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (1)(A), strike , for the period of fiscal years 2011 through 2016,; and
in paragraph (2)(A)(i), strike for the period of fiscal years 2011 through 2016.

subsection.text: Section 615(c)(7) of the Aamodt Litigation Settlement Act (Public Law 111–291; 124 Stat. 3146) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (A)(i), by striking section 617(c)(1) and inserting section 617(c)(1)(A); and
in subparagraph (B), by striking section 617(c)(1) and inserting section 617(c)(1)(B).

subsection.text: Section 617 of the Aamodt Litigation Settlement Act (Public Law 111–291; 124 Stat. 3146) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (a)(1)(A), by striking for the period of fiscal years 2011 through 2016,; and
in subsection (c)(1)(A), by striking for the period of fiscal years 2011 through 2015.

subsection.text: Section 10302 of the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 (43 U.S.C. 407 note; Public Law 111–11) is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (2), by striking Arrellano and inserting Arellano; and
in paragraph (27), by striking 75–185 and inserting 75–184.

subsection.header: Delivery and use of Navajo-Gallup water supply project water
subsection.text: Section 10603(c)(2)(A) of the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 (Public Law 111–11; 123 Stat. 1385) is amended—

paragraph.text: in clause (i), by striking Article III(c) and inserting Articles III(c); and
in clause (ii)(II), by striking Article III(c) and inserting Articles III(c).

subsection.text: Section 10604(f)(1) of the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 (Public Law 111–11; 123 Stat. 1391) is amended by inserting Project before water.
Section 10609 of the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 (Public Law 111–11; 123 Stat. 1395) is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraphs (1) and (2) of subsection (b), by striking construction or rehabilitation each place it appears and inserting planning, design, construction, rehabilitation,;
in subsection (e)(1), by striking 2 percent and inserting 4 percent; and
in subsection (f)(1), by striking 4 percent and inserting 2 percent.

subsection.text: Section 10701(e) of the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 (Public Law 111–11; 123 Stat. 1400) is amended in paragraphs (2)(A), (2)(B), and (3)(A) by striking and Contract each place it appears.
